merchant_dwarves.name: Merchant Dwarves
merchant_dwarves.description: Famous for their gold-lust, the Merchant Dwarves hire themselves out to any force that can afford them.  Their powerful technology and airships make them a dangerous foe.

storm_wardens.name: Storm Wardens
storm_wardens.description: Creations of an arch-wizard, the Storm Wardens exist to enforce peace around the realms - no matter who it may favour. Their incredible weapons and armour are unmatched by other races.

vampire_lords.name: Vampire Lords
vampire_lords.description: Vampire Lords are necromancers who have learned to imbue themselves with necrotic power. They wield their undead hordes like a weapon, to cut away those who would stand in their way.

haunting_ghosts.name: Haunting Ghosts
haunting_ghosts.description: Places of necromantic power can often spontaneously bring the dead back to life, and without a leader they have only one drive:  Spread that necromantic power, through the death of those nearby!

orcs_and_goblins.name: Orcs and Goblins
orcs_and_goblins.description: Creatures from faraway lands, the Orcs and Goblins are usually content to feud among themselves - but when they turn their attention elsewhere, they prove themselves a truly powerful foe.

armor.name: Armor
armor.description: The great goblin forges are blazing anew, supplying their orcish masters with mastercrafted equipment as crude as they may seem.

speed.name: Speed
speed.description: This force focuses on using chariots, boars and anything that goes fast.

trickery.name: Trickery
trickery.description: Striking in moonlight, these masters of deception, as far as orcs are concerned, use outflanking and ambush maneuvers to gain the upper hand.

primal.name: Primal
primal.description: Empowered by their animalistic gods, the strongest warriors charge into battle with fearsome beasts at their side.

high_elves.name: High Elves
high_elves.description: The High Elves are dedicated to holding and defending the lands they already have, and will destroy any force that dares to threaten their holdings.

mountain_dwarves.name: Mountain Dwarves
mountain_dwarves.description: The Mountain Dwarves were forced back to deep holes and warrens, but have regathered their forces.  They seek to conquer lands that were once theirs, in the belief that other races on them are merely squatters.

ogre_mercenaries.name: Ogre Mercenaries
ogre_mercenaries.description: Once the scourge of the lands, the ogres have learned that they keep their bellies fuller by hiring themselves out as mercenaries than by killing people who can cook for them.

greatogre_raiders.name: Greatogre Raiders
greatogre_raiders.description: The greatest of ogre tribes, who only interact with their lessers when they need something - food, coin, or just a challenge!

corrupted_legions.name: Corrupted Legions
corrupted_legions.description: The Corrupted Legions prove that even dead gods can be mightier than mortals.  Wearing powerful cursed armour and wielding weapons with ancient enchantments, they seek the ressurection of their dark masters.

change.name: Magic
change.description: Mighty Sorcerers that bring down a storm of spells, empowered by hordes of cultists that give their life in pursuit of knowledge.

pestilence.name: Pestilence
pestilence.description: The forces of the unstoppable decay of all life, born anew as a warrior of the dark gods.

wrath.name: Wrath
wrath.description: Warriors of unbridled fury, filled with an eternal bloodlust and always looking for ever greater foes to still it.

excess.name: Excess
excess.description: Sadistic and twisted Warriors, always seeking for new ways of ecstasy.

deception.name: Deception
deception.description: Agents of chaos that undermine enemy forces and crumble them from within or lead a corrupt government themselves.

sea_elves.name: Sea Elves
sea_elves.description: Transmuted by ancient magic to be mightier than any other elf, the Sea Elves require incredible alchemical concoctions to survive.  They hire themselves out to other races to afford their survival, and live under the sea to avoid mortal conflict.

beastmen_horde.name: Beastmen Horde
beastmen_horde.description: The Beastmen seek nothing less than the destruction of civilization and the pointless rules it brings.  They enlist great war-beasts and horrible creatures to their aid.

change.name: Magic
change.description: Mighty Sorcerers that bring down a storm of spells, empowered by hordes of cultists that give their life in pursuit of knowledge.

pestilence.name: Pestilence
pestilence.description: The forces of the unstoppable decay of all life, born anew as a warrior of the dark gods.

wrath.name: Wrath
wrath.description: Warriors of unbridled fury, filled with an eternal bloodlust and always looking for ever greater foes to still it.

excess.name: Excess
excess.description: Sadistic and twisted Warriors, always seeking for new ways of ecstasy.

human_kingdoms.name: Human Kingdoms
human_kingdoms.description: The myriad of Human Kingdoms are mercurial and quick-blooded, wanting only peace one generation while seeking to conquer the world the next - and well-equipped for either.

lizardmen.name: Lizardmen
lizardmen.description: A race of relentless jungle-dwelling lizards who who believe they are the rightful inheritors to the world.

corrupted_dwarves.name: Corrupted Dwarves
corrupted_dwarves.description: Twisted by the whispers of dead gods, the Corrupted Dwarves have learned to put chaotic magic into their machines.  They fight as much at the whims of their dark masters as their own choice.

change.name: Magic
change.description: Mighty Sorcerers that bring down a storm of spells, empowered by hordes of cultists that give their life in pursuit of knowledge.

pestilence.name: Pestilence
pestilence.description: The forces of the unstoppable decay of all life, born anew as a warrior of the dark gods.

wrath.name: Wrath
wrath.description: Warriors of unbridled fury, filled with an eternal bloodlust and always looking for ever greater foes to still it.

excess.name: Excess
excess.description: Sadistic and twisted Warriors, always seeking for new ways of ecstasy.

dark_elves.name: Dark Elves
dark_elves.description: The Dark Elves are dedicated to conquering and taking whatever land they can, and aren't afraid to bring the full might of elven wisdom and power to bear to do it.

wood_elves.name: Wood Elves
wood_elves.description: Hidden away in their forests, the Wood Elves seek only peace, and the spreading of nature's gifts.  They go to war only to fight those who would despoil their forests or stop their spread.

spite.name: Spite-Grove
spite.description: Fueled by their own rage, lashing out at the outside world in brutal and quick skirmishes.

life.name: Life-Grove
life.description: Protecting the land and all its inhabitants, following the circle of life and death.

sorrow.name: Sorrow-Grove
sorrow.description: Blinded by their own hate, these forces of the woods have turned against their elven allies and the rest of the world.

watchers.name: Wayward Watcher
watchers.description: Nomadic Guardians of ancient paths and groves, setting out to seek out and destroy great dangers.

skirmish.name: Generalist
skirmish.description: A well-rounded force for taking on any mission.

elite.name: Elite
elite.description: An elite force to deal with specific targets.

rare.name: Rare
rare.description: A rare force to pack a punch on the field.

inspired.name: Inspired
inspired.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Inspired.
inspired.flavor: This model inspires the best in those who serve them.

expert_fighter.name: Expert Fighter
expert_fighter.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Expert Fighter.
expert_fighter.flavor: This model has fought in many close quarters fights and survived.

quick_reflexes.name: Quick Reflexes
quick_reflexes.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Quick Reflexes.
quick_reflexes.flavor: This model has expert awareness and can react quickly.

searing_bolt.name: Searing Bolt
searing_bolt.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 1 hits with AP(4).

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 3 hit with AP(1). This power may be cast unlimited times per turn.

flaming_sword.name: Flaming Sword
flaming_sword.description: This unit gains +1 Strength and may make one additional attack with any Melee weapon until the end of the turn.

crushing_waves.name: Crushing Waves
crushing_waves.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 4 hits with AP(4).

aqueous_form.name: Aqueous Form
aqueous_form.description: Target friendly unit within 12" gets +2" Movement and may treat Difficult Ground as normal terrain until the end of the turn.

whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
whirlpool.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 3 hit with AP(0).

lightning_bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
lightning_bolt.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 1 hit with AP(7).

violent_gale.name: Violent Gale
violent_gale.description: Target enemy unit within 18" take 3 hits with AP(0) and is pushed 3" away from this model.

haste.name: Haste
haste.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may immediately make a free move action.

crystal_volley.name: Crystal Volley
crystal_volley.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 5 hits each with AP(1).

earthen_armor.name: Earthen Armor
earthen_armor.description: Target friendly unit within 12" gains +1 Save until the end of the turn.

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 3 hits with AP(1). Roll a d10 for all units within 3" of it. On a 5 or less that unit is hit as well

wild_frenzy.name: Wild Frenzy
wild_frenzy.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may make one additional attack with any Melee weapon until the end of the turn.

entangling_roots.name: Entangling Roots
entangling_roots.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 3 hit with AP(0) and has -2" Movement until the end of the turn.

poison_spores.name: Poison Spores
poison_spores.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 3 hits with AP(2).

molten_iron.name: Rust
molten_iron.description: Target enemy unit within 12" has -1 Save until end of turn.

silver_bolt.name: Silver Bolt
silver_bolt.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 1 hit with AP(3). This power may be cast unlimited times per turn.

magic_shield.name: Magic Shield
magic_shield.description: Target friendly unit within 12". Until the end of the round, roll a D10 each time that unit is hit. On a 3 or less, that hit is ignored. This power may be cast unlimited times.

cloak_of_shadows.name: Cloak of Shadows
cloak_of_shadows.description: Target a friendly unit within 12". Until the end of the turn models suffer -1 Accuracy when shooting at this unit.

soul_dagger.name: Soul Dagger
soul_dagger.description: Target enemy model within 12" takes 1 hit with AP(3).

fright.name: Fright
fright.description: Target enemy unit within 12" gains 2 Shock.

inspiration.name: Inspiration
inspiration.description: Target friendly unit within 12" removes 2 Shock.

blinding_shield.name: Blinding Shield
blinding_shield.description: Target a friendly unit within 12". Until the end of the turn models suffer -1 Strength when targeting this unit with a melee attack.

smite.name: Smite
smite.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 3 hits with AP(0). This power may be cast unlimited times per turn.

drain_life.name: Drain Life
drain_life.description: Target enemy model within 12" takes 1 hit with AP(3). If the model is slain restore 1 wound to this model.

doom.name: Doom
doom.description: Target enemy unit within 12" -1 Courage until the end of the turn.

spectral_grasp.name: Spectral Grasp
spectral_grasp.description: Target enemy unit within 18" take 3 hits with AP(0) and is pulled 3" towards this model.

frost_lance.name: Frost Lance
frost_lance.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 1 hit with AP(3).

hailstorm.name: Hailstorm
hailstorm.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 3 hits with AP(1) and has -1 Accuracy until the end of the turn.

avalanche.name: Avalanche
avalanche.description: Roll a d10 for each enemy units with 9". On a roll of 5 or lower the unit hit takes 3 hits with AP(3).

legend_strategist.name: Brilliant Strategist
legend_strategist.description: While this model is on the table you gain 1 additional Strategy Point per round.

legend_expert_fighter.name: Expert Fighter
legend_expert_fighter.description: This model may make one additional attack with any Melee weapon.

buckler.name: Buckler
buckler.description: This model has +1 Save against melee attacks.

icon.name: Icon
icon.description: Friendly units of X types within 6" may re-roll a single failed Courage test when removing Shock.

ethereal.name: Ethereal
ethereal.description: This model may ignore other models and any terrain when moving.

barbed_net.name: Barbed Net
barbed_net.description: Units hit by this weapon half their movement until the end of the turn.

poisoned_blades.name: Poisoned Blades
poisoned_blades.description: This model's melee weapons have +1 AP against enemies without _Damage Table(X)_.

regeneration.name: Regeneration
regeneration.description: At the end of it's activation you can heal 1 wound that has been allocated to this model.

heavy_buckler.name: Heavy Buckler
heavy_buckler.description: This model has +1 Save against melee attacks.

crazed.name: Crazed
crazed.description: When you activate this unit make an initiative test. If successful, until the end of the turn whenever you make a move action with this unit you may sprint without needing to make an initiative test.

repair.name: Repair
repair.description: At any point during this unit's activation, if within 3" of a Vehicle or Warmachine, roll one die. On an X or less the vehicle or warmachine may remove one critical damage.

repair_toolkit.name: Repair Toolkit
repair_toolkit.description: This model and its unit may spend one action to repair one vehicle or warmachine within 3" that has suffered critical damage.

disk_of_change.name: Disk of Change
disk_of_change.description: This model increases its Movement by 2". This unit may ignore difficult terrain and obstacles of height 2" or less when moving.

battle_prayer.name: Battle Prayer
battle_prayer.description:
When this unit is activated, choose a Blessing for this unit or a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" to receive until the end of the turn:
* Divine Shield: Roll a die when a model in this unit loses a wound. On a value of 1 or 2 that wound is not lost.
* Righteous Fury: When this unit fights, hit rolls of 1 or 2 generate an additional attack.
* Healing Word: One model in the unit immediately heals D3 wounds.

curse.name: Curse
curse.description:
When this unit is activated, choose a Curse for an enemy _Infantry_ unit within 6" to receive until the end of the turn:
* Weakness: This unit has -1 Strength and Accuracy when fighting or making a shooting attack.
* Brittle Bones: When this unit is targeted by an attack, hit rolls of 1 or 2 generate an additional attack.
* Soul Siphon: One model in the unit immediately takes 2 hits with AP2.

trappers.name: Trappers
trappers.description: When this model's unit successfully performs a counter attack or escape reaction, the charging unit suffers 6 hits with no AP.

raise_dead.name: Raise Dead
raise_dead.description: Roll a die each time this model kills an enemy model. On a roll of 1 or 2, place a Zombie model that has died this game within base contact of this model.

vampiric_siphon.name: Vampiric Siphon
vampiric_siphon.description: At the end of any activation in which this unit slew any enemy models, you can heal 1 wound that has been allocated to a model in this unit.

warrior_tactics.name: Warrior Tactics
warrior_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6". This unit and those units may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

ranger_tactics.name: Ranger Tactics
ranger_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6". This unit and those units may re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

blackpowder_tactics.name: Blackpowder Tactics
blackpowder_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Warmachine_ units within 6". This unit and those units may re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

knight_tactics.name: Knight Tactics
knight_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Cavalry_ units within 6". This unit and those units may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

marauder_tactics.name: Marauder Tactics
marauder_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Cavalry_ units within 6". This unit and those units may re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

hover_mode.name: Hover Mode
hover_mode.description: When this Aircraft is activated, it may choose to fly in Hover mode. If it does, units do not suffer -1 Accuracy when targeting this unit, but it is not required to make a move action when activated.
